#food#baking#colour#love

We make everything fresh, every single day, with no preservatives. It's a lot of work, but we're proud to only offer the best.

stopped by yesterday for some treats, great seeing how busy you are, I have an idea.  You're doing so well at your current location, perhaps it's time to branch out.  There is a great location on Geary Blvd, that used to be a kosher butcher, great foot traffic and I must say it would be easier to get there than to go downtown, just an idea I would pass along. Eastridge Center is holding a culinary competition called Taste for the Space. We think it could be a great opportunity for you. Competitors will have the chance to win a fully equipped eatery space at Eastridge Center with six months free rent and a $50,000 investment – a total prize package worth $140,000!
 
Taste for the Space will be held on May 13th and is San Jose culinary competition and community experience. This interactive, press-worthy event will expose competitors to one thousand plus attendees and thousands of dollars in media exposure. A minimum of 12 competitors will be selected to show the crowd why their taste should win the space!
 
Competitors will participate in the May 13th event with a station and tasting dish. Set up much like a food festival, the crowd will taste the contestants’ signature dishes then text in whom they wish to see open at Eastridge Center. A panel of judges, along with the community voice, will select a winner for the chance of a lifetime!
 
*Eastridge and sponsors will assist with food supplies and some rentals for the competition to minimize competitor expenses.
 
The lucky winner will have the opportunity to open their new eatery space with a fully equipped kitchen, zero rent for 6 whole months and a $50,000 investment prize to get started! Applications are now open at http://eastridgecenter.com/tasteforthespace/.

top_3_facebook_posts.message: Thank you, Taste TV. We had a blast filming with you!

Happy Sunday Folks! Gluten free vegan sandwiches and salads. #guiltfree #yumm #wegotyou #veganpicnic
👌😋
We are SO excited to be featured in your store! We are confident your community will love Mama's Cookies. We pride ourselves on not just being vegan, but also gluten-free, organic & homemade locally!
Happy Sunday from Vegan Picnic. As always, thanks to the amazing bakers @frena_bakery for these vegan chocolate croissants! 😍🥐#vegansf #kosher #vegan #veganpicnic #chocolatecroissant #sundayfunday
See you all this weekend for the Union Street Music Festival! We will be open 10 to 6 Saturday and Sunday. 🎉#sanfrancisco #vegansf #marina #unionstreetfestival
Vegan Picnic will be on TasteTV Tasteable: California this Friday at 1 pm on KRCB channel 22/722!

We've got MERCH! That's right, sweatshirt, hats, t-shirts, and tanks for all! All featured under our new 'pic' wall. Come cozy up with some gear and take an insta shot while you're at it! #guiltlesslydelicious #merchandise #vegan #cute #boomerang
📣📣📣Thanks to our friends @frena_bakery, we have vanilla cream donuts now. Thanks boys! We ♥️you #vegan #kosher #comfortvegan #donuts #veganpicnic #marina #sanfrancisco #vegansf

I mean... when you combine beautiful challah buns from Frena bakery with our sriracha mayo and vegan crispy chicken, you get some magic. This is our most popular sandwich for a reason. Get in here and try one!
VP Classic Chinese Chicken Salad with crispy chicken, crunchy rice noodles, & tangy ginger sesame dressing.  Just like you remember it!
Don't fret, on this stormy Sunday, we have extra donuts.  Thanks Frena Bakery!
Big, big love for our customers!
🚨🚨🚨 We have corn dogs now 🚨🚨🚨
Vegan gluten free chicken and waffle sandwich is delicious!!!

comment_content: Just happened to catch the show right now! Can't wait to try your food next time I'm in SF! Love from Oakland!

Special Happy Hour menu for Bastille Day 

Wine by the glass ($6)
-Rosé Rive Sud 
-Pinot Noir Les Carabenes
-Chardonnay Monte Vallon
-Sparkling Rosé

Beers ($5)
-Paulaner Hefe Weisen 
-Grimbergen Blonde
-Uinta Hop Nosh IPA

Apero Platter ($19)
Delice de Bourgogne (triple cream), 12-month cave aged Gruyere, Saucisson sec, Cornichons

Tapas Platter ($19)
Manchego, Serrano (spanish cured ham), Chorizo, membrillo, olives

See you all Friday !!!! :)
Cheese cutting tips!

La Fromagerie de Montgomery is happy to host a casual Happy hour to celebrate Bastille Day! Come meet us and enjoy our happy hour treats with fine wines, gourmet cheeses and charcuterie for a celebration A LA FRANCAISE !

Special Happy Hour menu

Wine by the glass ($6)
-Rosé Rive Sud 
-Pinot Noir Les Carabenes
-Chardonnay Monte Vallon
-Sparkling Rosé

Beers ($5)
-Paulaner Hefe Weisen 
-Grimbergen Blonde
-Uinta Hop Nosh IPA

Apero Platter ($19)
Delice de Bourgogne (triple cream), 12-month cave aged Gruyere, Saucisson sec, Cornichons

Tapas Platter ($19)
Manchego, Serrano (spanish cured ham), Chorizo, membrillo, olives
Father's Day is just around the corner! We marked down all gift items on our website until Thursday. Shop online at http://lafromageriesf.com/gifts/ with coupon code DAD10 to receive 10% off.
"I don't need a fancy party to be happy. Just good friends, good food, and good laughs. I'm happy. I'm satisfied. I'm content" Maria Sharapova
Happy #NationalCheeseDay!
Delicious !
Happy Valentine's day!
Bake one of those cheese! 😊
"Sandwiches are wonderful. You don't need a spoon or a plate!" Paul Lynde
Homemade burger with 12 months cave aged gruyere...yummy!
"There is no sincerer love than the love of food." GB SHAW
Today's the day, #RawMilkCheese Fans! 🎉 Stop by our Dogpatch cheese shop for a free taste of some raw milk deliciousness.
Hidden gem in Lucca, Italy 😊
"There is no sincerer love than the love of food" George Bernard Shaw
Happy Cheesester!
Happy #InternationalWomensDay to all the powerful & brilliant women!
La Fromagerie is celebrating the 256th birthday of camembert cheese inventor Marie Harel. Come sample our delicious camembert from Normandie!
We will see you guys tomorrow!! Let's start to celebrate at 4pm!

The Brie cheese here was tested by SCiO and was as good as advertised!!
👍

Help needed at La Fromagerie at 101 Montgomery street, from 10:45 am to 7:00 pm Monday to Friday. Looking for a cheese lover with strong ethics and interpersonal skills. Please respond to aymeric@lafromageriesf.com or call 415-910-5666
Tips for cheese servings!
Happy Fourth of July! We hope everyone has a delicious day off.
A bit of history!
Thank you for Lunch today!!
